titles.title: A resolution celebrating the 25th anniversary of the passage of the Mike Mansfield Fellowship Act creating the Mike Mansfield Fellowship Program.
A resolution celebrating the 25th anniversary of the passage of the Mike Mansfield Fellowship Act creating the Mike Mansfield Fellowship Program.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This resolution celebrates the 25th anniversary of the establishment of the Mike Mansfield Fellowship Program. The resolution also expresses remembrance of the contributions of Senator Mike Mansfield and his wife Maureen to the Senate and to the U.S.-Japan alliance.
